column4: My dual monitors only work in gnome. How do I make them work using xfce or kde? Ubuntu 9.10 using an ATI Radeon X1300/X1550 Series graphics card.
you could do it manually by editing your xorg.conf file
I'm understood that xorg.conf isn't used anymore in Ubuntu 9.10
anything I save in there doesn't seem to affect anything.
that is incorrect.  xorg.conf can't go away so long as Xorg is not psychic.  it tries to automagically do things, when it fails, you use the config
you could try opening up the Gnome setting app from XFCE4 or KDE
